You need to enable our service manually.

What to do:
1. Tap “Open Settings” below.
2. In the system list, find “Senior Rescue Assistant”.
3. Turn the main switch On.
4. Confirm enabling the service.

We need notification access to warn about calls in silent mode.

What to do:
1. Tap “Open Settings” below.
2. Find “Senior Rescue Assistant” in the list and enable notification access.
3. Return to the app to continue.

What to do:
1. Tap “Open Settings” below.
